mapper.select: select * from erp_client ec left join erp_country eco on ec.country_no = eco.country_no left join erp_clientsort ecs on ec.clientsort_no = ecs.clientsort_no left join erp_businesstype eb on ec.businesstype_no = eb.businesstype_no
mapper.update: update erp_client set businesstype_no = #{businesstype_no} where client_no = #{client_no}
mapper.select: select * from erp_forsales ef left join erp_team et on ef.team_no = et.team_no left join erp_client ec on ef.client_no = ec.client_no left join erp_goods eg on ef.goods_no = eg.goods_no left join erp_incoterms ei on ef.incoterms_no = ei.incoterms_no left join erp_settletype es on ef.settletype_no = es.settletype_no
mapper.insert: insert into erp_forsales(team_no, client_no, forsales_date, goods_no, forsales_qty, forsales_price, forsales_tax, forsales_total, incoterms_no, settletype_no) values(#{team_no}, #{client_no}, #{forsales_date}, #{goods_no}, #{forsales_qty}, #{forsales_price}, #{forsales_tax}, #{forsales_total}, #{incoterms_no}, #{settletype_no})
mapper.select: select * from erp_importpay ei left join erp_client ec on ei.client_no = ec.client_no left join erp_import eip on ei.import_no = eip.import_no left join erp_goods eg on eip.goods_no = eg.goods_no
